Task Description: Conduct stakeholder interviews and workshops
Evaluate current infrastructure and integration points
Assess security requirements and compliance needs
Create detailed technical architecture and design
Develop implementation timeline and resource allocation
Identify and document project risks and mitigation strategies
Provision and configure cloud infrastructure
Build primary application functionality
Design and implement database schema and procedures
Build API integrations and data connectors
Create user interface and user experience components
Develop and execute unit tests for all components
Test system integrations and data flows
Conduct load and performance testing
Perform security assessments and penetration testing
Notes: Third-party security audit may be required

Task Description: Coordinate and support UAT with business users
Deploy solution to production environment
Migrate existing data to new system
Provide support during initial production rollout
Train system administrators and technical users
Train business users on system functionality
Create user manuals and technical documentation
Transfer ownership to operations and support teams
Conduct project retrospective and document learnings
